data.Name: Gilberto Santa Rosa
data.Bio: Gilberto Santa Rosa was born on 21 August 1962, in Puerto Rico and today is known as "El Caballero de la Salsa" (the gentleman of salsa). In 1976 he started with a group of amateurs in Puerto Rico, and his first recording was with the Mario Ortiz Orchestra. He then moved on to Orquesta La Grande, and during the two years Gilberto was with them, he met Mr. Elias Lop√©s who later helped mold and polish the promising young singer, releasing three recordings. Read more on Last.fm
